/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban architecture and greenery. Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, a large billboard stands out, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
